title: National debt of Japan 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollar
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in billion U.S. dollar, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general National debt in billion U.S. dollar has rose over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollar is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest National debt in billion U.S. dollar, of value 12935.09 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest National debt in billion U.S. dollar, of value 11111.32 was reported at Year 2014
